quote: Either you go to America with Mrs. Van Hopper or you come home to Manderley with me.""""Do you mean you want a secretary or something?""""No, I'm asking you to marry me, you little fool.
quote_letters: EITHER YOU GO TO AMERICA WITH MRS VAN HOPPER OR YOU COME HOME TO MANDERLEY WITH MEDO YOU MEAN YOU WANT A SECRETARY OR SOMETHINGNO IM ASKING YOU TO MARRY ME YOU LITTLE FOOL
